short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple ai chrome extension to generate content of the current page perception

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write wise AI is a simple chrome extension designed to enhance productivity by generating AI-driven content based tweaked for different social media platforms. It also generate based on the current webpage's context. The writewise extension leverages chatgpt, gemini, claude andother ai models to analyze the text from the page, creating summaries, marketing copy, blog posts, and social media content like Instagram or LinkedIn posts, tailored specifically to the page's perceived content. This helps users save time by automating content generation directly from what they are currently viewing.
